title: Tywyn
name: Tonfanau Road Races
directions: Just to the north of the town, on the opposte side of the Dysynni river mouth
content: 4 Motorbike Race Meetings a year (Easter, Spring Bank Holiday, July, August Bank Holiday) are held by Crewe and South Cheshire MCRR at the Tonfanau cicuit, . Tonfanau is a 1-mile, clockwise circuit, built on part of a former military base.
